name: Cathulhu - Adventures in Madness
description:
Join four Catventurers as they travel the halls of a maddening summer residence! Will the elder gods claim their lives? Or will they escape the wretched grasp of the evil ghost of Pharaoh Semeowkhet?

Your choices will determine their fate!

Music by Kevin MacLeod: http://incompetech.com/

#Gamehubjam

Fixed Bugs:
Currently there is no endstates.
